data.name: Spider-Man 2099
data.description: Fighting crime in our time from the far-flung future, Miguel O'Hara uses his powers to exploit enemy weaknesses as the Spider-Man of tomorrow!

starItems.name: Spider-Man 2099
starItems.description: Fighting crime in our time from the far-flung future, Miguel O'Hara uses his powers to exploit enemy weaknesses as the Spider-Man of tomorrow!

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage.

Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, on Crit:
 > Prolong the duration of all negative effects, except <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, and <color=#fff568>Trauma</color>, on all targets by <color=#86e619>1</color>.
 > Prolong the duration of all <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> on all targets by an additional <color=#86e619>1</color>.
1.nextUpgrade: Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> random positive effect on primary and secondary targets

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> random positive effect.

Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> random positive effect.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, on Crit:
 > Prolong the duration of all negative effects, except <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, and <color=#fff568>Trauma</color>, on all targets by <color=#86e619>1</color>.
 > Prolong the duration of all <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> on all targets by an additional <color=#86e619>1</color>.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> random positive effect.

Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> random positive effect.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, on Crit:
 > Prolong the duration of all negative effects, except <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, and <color=#fff568>Trauma</color>, on all targets by <color=#86e619>1</color>.
 > Prolong the duration of all <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> on all targets by an additional <color=#86e619>1</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to primary and secondary targets

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> random positive effect + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> and <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> random positive effect + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, on Crit:

 > Prolong the duration of all <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> on all targets by an additional <color=#86e619>1</color>.

5.description:

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> random positive effects + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> and <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> random positive effects + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, on Crit:
 > Prolong the duration of all negative effects, except <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, and <color=#fff568>Trauma</color>, on all targets by <color=#86e619>1</color>.

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> random positive effects + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> and <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> random positive effects + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, on Crit:
 > Prolong the duration of all negative effects, except <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, and <color=#fff568>Trauma</color>, on all targets by <color=#86e619>1</color>.
 > Prolong the duration of all <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> on all targets by an additional <color=#86e619>1</color>.

1.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to <color=#86e619>2</color> random allies that don't have <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>, prioritizing <color=#fff568>TANGLED WEB</color> allies.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, on Crit:
 > Prolong the duration of all negative effects, except <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, and <color=#fff568>Trauma</color>, on all targets by <color=#86e619>1</color>.
 > Prolong the duration of all <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> on all targets by an additional <color=#86e619>1</color>.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be Blocked.
1.nextUpgrade: Flip <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> on primary and secondary targets

2.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + flip <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to <color=#86e619>2</color> random allies that don't have <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>, prioritizing <color=#fff568>TANGLED WEB</color> allies.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, on Crit:
 > Prolong the duration of all negative effects, except <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, and <color=#fff568>Trauma</color>, on all targets by <color=#86e619>1</color>.
 > Prolong the duration of all <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> on all targets by an additional <color=#86e619>1</color>.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be Blocked.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to primary and secondary targets

3.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + flip <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to <color=#86e619>2</color> random allies that don't have <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>, prioritizing <color=#fff568>TANGLED WEB</color> allies.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, on Crit:

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be Blocked.
3.nextUpgrade: Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the primary target

6.description:

7.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the primary target.

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to <color=#86e619>2</color> random allies that don't have <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>, prioritizing <color=#fff568>TANGLED WEB</color> allies.

1.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> and <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

Fill the Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color> for self and all <color=#fff568>TANGLED WEB</color> allies.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, on Crit:
 > Prolong the duration of all negative effects, except <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, and <color=#fff568>Trauma</color>, on all targets by <color=#86e619>1</color>.
 > Prolong the duration of all <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> on all targets by an additional <color=#86e619>1</color>.
1.nextUpgrade:
If the primary target has <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, apply <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to self and all allies
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> random positive effect

2.description:
If the primary target has <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, apply <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to self and all allies.

+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to all enemies
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> random positive effects

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, on Crit:
 > Prolong the duration of all negative effects, except <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, and <color=#fff568>Trauma</color>, on all targets by <color=#86e619>1</color>.
 > Prolong the duration of all <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> on all targets by an additional <color=#86e619>1</color>.

1.description:
On Turn, flip <color=#86e619>1</color> random positive effect to a negative effect on each enemy.

This character gains +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus for each active ability when clearing positive effects from enemies.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, if Spider-Weaver is an ally, lower Damage Reduction for all enemies with <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Drain. <color=#fff568>TANGLED WEB</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Drain.
1.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Focus
<color=#fff568>TANGLED WEB</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Focus

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Drain. <color=#fff568>TANGLED WEB</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Drain.
Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Focus. <color=#fff568>TANGLED WEB</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Focus.

<color=#fff568>TANGLED WEB</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Resistance

3.description:
On Spawn, if Spider-Weaver is an ally, gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>.

On Turn, flip <color=#86e619>1</color> random positive effect to a negative effect on each enemy.

This character gains +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus for each active ability when clearing positive effects from enemies.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, if Spider-Weaver is an ally, lower Damage Reduction for all enemies with <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.

3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Drain for self and <color=#fff568>TANGLED WEB</color> allies
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, all allies gain an additional +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Resistance

This character gains +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus for each active ability when clearing positive effects from enemies.

item.name: Gold
item.description: Gold is required to upgrade your character's level, abilities, and Star rank. Earn Gold in Campaign missions and Challenges.
